verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With every breath with every salt
From what it seem to the deepest part
I offer all that I've come to be
To know your love fathering me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Father you're all I need
My souls sufficiency
My strength when I am weak
The love that carries me
Your arms enfold me, till I am only
A child of God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
With every step on this journey's walk
And wisdom's songs that the soul has
sought
I give myself unreservedly
To know your love fathering me.
